sense.gloss: to chew, to gnaw, to masticate
to fumble one's words (esp. during a play, broadcast, etc.), to falter with one's words, to stutter, to stammer
to crash against (e.g. of waves), to break onto (shore)
to engage (of cogs, zippers, etc.), to mesh, to fit together
to hit (someone) once, to give (someone) a punch
to engage (with), to be in gear (with), to mesh
to be on the same wavelength
to stifle a smile, yawn, etc.
to bite off, to gnaw through
to chew thoroughly, to bite (e.g. one's lip)

sdata.j: ↑窮鼠↑↓きゅうそ↓↑猫↑↓ねこ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓む。
sdata.e: A cornered rat will bite a cat.

sdata.j: ↑噛↑↓か↓むとこの↑歯↑↓は↓が↑痛↑↓いた↓みます。
sdata.e: When I bite down, this tooth hurts.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓の↑議論↑↓ぎろん↓が↑噛↑↓か↓み↑合↑↓あ↓わないのは↑明↑↓あき↓らかだ。
sdata.e: It's clear that our arguments don't overlap at all.

sdata.j: ↑右側↑↓みぎがわ↓では↑噛↑↓か↓まないでくださいね。
sdata.e: Don't bite on the right side.

sdata.j: ラクダに↑近↑↓ちか↓づくと、↑噛↑↓か↓み↑付↑↓つ↓かれる↑危険↑↓きけん↓があるよ。
sdata.e: If you go near a camel, you risk being bitten.

sdata.j: ↑吠↑↓ほ↓える↑犬↑↓いぬ↓は↑滅多↑↓めった↓に↑噛↑↓か↓まないものだ。
↑吠↑↓ほ↓える↑犬↑↓いぬ↓はめったに↑噛↑↓か↓み↑付↑↓つ↓く↑事↑↓こと↓はない。
どんな↑犬↑↓いぬ↓でも↑一↑↓いち↓↑度↑↓ど↓↑噛↑↓か↓み↑付↑↓つ↓く↑権利↑↓けんり↓がある。
sdata.e: Every dog is entitled to one bite.

sdata.j: ↑爪↑↓つめ↓を↑噛↑↓か↓むのはよしなさい。

words.gloss: to hit (someone) once, to give (someone) a punch
